HAL India Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for 09 Airframe & Engine Fitter Posts
Harshitha / All Government Jobs / Jul 24, 2025, 09:16 IST
 Hindustan Aeronautics Limited
 9 Jobs |  Posted On : 24-Jul-2025 |  Karnataka |  Salary : 23,000 to 23,000




FOLLOW

The Hindustan Aeronautics Limited (HAL India) has officially released the notification to fill up the vacancies of 09 Airframe Fitters, Engine Fitters, Weapon Fitters, and Electrical Fitters Posts. Candidates can apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their Diploma in Electrical and Mechanical Engineering can apply for the HAL India Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can apply in offline mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application, salary, and how to apply for these posts before the deadline. The application dates have already begun.




If you are more interested in Government Jobs, candidates can also apply for the jobs in Karnataka.

HAL India Recruitment 2025 Eligiblity Criteria:
Name of the Posts	Vacancies	Education
Airframe Fitter	05	Diploma in Mechanical Engineering
Engine Fitter	01
Weapon Fitter	01
Electrical Fitter	01	Diploma in Electrical Engineering.

HAL India Recruitment 2025 Age Limit:

The minimum age limit: 21 Years.
The maximum age limit: 28 Years.
Age relaxation is based on the Organisation's norms.

HAL India Recruitment 2025 Selection Process:

The selection process is

Written Test.
Interview.

HAL India Recruitment 2025 Application Fee:

There is no application fee.

HAL India Recruitment 2025 Pay Scale:

The basic pay: Rs. 23,000/- per month.
How to Apply for the HAL India Recruitment 2025:
Go to the official website.
Visit the HAL India Recruitment 2025 notification.
Read the instructions carefully and check the eligiblity criteria.
Download the application form.
Fill out the application form without any mistakes.
Pay the application fee (if needed).
Attach the required documents to the filled application form.
Submit the filled application form to the mentioned address.
Take a printout of the filled application form for further use.

Address:

Chief Manager (HR), Recruitment Cell, Hindustan Aeronautics Limited, LCA Tejas Division, Post Bag No.3791, Bangalore-560037, Karnataka.

Important Dates:

Starting date	23-07-2025
Closing date	23-08-2025

 

Official Notification	Click Here
Apply Online	Click Here

Join on Telegram	Join Now
